virtual int IO2GSession::getReportURL ( char *  urlBuffer,
int  bufferSize,
IO2GAccountRow *  account,
DATE  dateFrom,
DATE  dateTo,
const char *  format,
const char *  reportType,
const char *  langID,
long  ansiCP 
)
pure virtual

Gets report URL.

Parameters
urlBuffer[out] URL buffer.
bufferSizeBuffer size.
accountAccount.
dateFromStart date of the report period.
dateToEnd date of the report period.
formatReport format. HTML will be used in case of 0.
reportTypeReport type.
langIDLanguage and locale of the report.
ansiCPCode page.
Returns
Number of characters written to the URL buffer if the function succeeds and urlBuffer is nonzero. The required size, in characters, for a buffer that can receive the URL string if the function succeeds and urlBuffer is zero. Negative value indicates failure. See O2GReportUrlError for possible values.
